quiz[description]:
Welcome to Quiz 2!

In this quiz, we will cover Chapter 4. Classification, and in particular Section 4.3. Decision Tree Induction from the course textbook. 

As pointed out in the course outline, continuous assessment includes 4 quizzes.

This quiz, Quiz 2, has 4 multiple choice questions. You will have ONLY ONE ATTEMPT to successfully complete the quiz. Please, complete Practical 5 before attempting this quiz. You have all the time you need to answer each of the questions. 

The dataset we will be using in some of the examples can be found in many classification examples, especially those related to decision trees.

Good luck!
